an5.132:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato ranno cakkavattissa jettho putto pitara pavattitam cakkam dhammeneva anuppavatteti;
an5.132:1.2: tam hoti cakkam appativattiyam kenaci manussabhutena paccatthikena panina.
an5.132:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno cakkavattissa jettho putto atthannu ca hoti, dhammannu ca, mattannu ca, kalannu ca, parisannu ca.
an5.132:2.3: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi angehi samannagato ranno cakkavattissa jettho putto pitara pavattitam cakkam dhammeneva anuppavatteti;
an5.132:2.4: tam hoti cakkam appativattiyam kenaci manussabhutena paccatthikena panina.
an5.132:3.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato sariputto tathagatena anuttaram dhammacakkam pavattitam sammadeva anuppavatteti;
an5.132:3.2: tam hoti cakkam appativattiyam samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmim.
an5.132:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sariputto atthannu, dhammannu, mattannu, kalannu, parisannu.
an5.132:4.3: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato sariputto tathagatena anuttaram dhammacakkam pavattitam sammadeva anuppavatteti;
an5.132:4.4: tam hoti cakkam appativattiyam samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmin”ti.
